author: Adamari Ruelas
title: Review Of ‘Wizards of Baking’ The New Harry Potter Baking Competition
text:
This article is written by a student writer from the Her Campus at CU Boulder chapter. The Food Network has given Harry Potter fans a lovely mixture of The Wizarding World and an intense baking competition in the new show, Wizards of Baking . As a diehard fan of the Harry Potter series and also someone that absolutely loves baking and watching baking shows, I was ecstatic when I first heard it. In the show, nine teams of two compete in baking challenges to win the Wizards of Baking Cup and the opportunity to be included in the new Harry Potter Cookbook . It premiered on Food Network and for streaming on MAX on November 14, and so far has only three episodes– with a new episode premiering every Thursday– so I wanted to give a quick review that might entice others to watch it before the season ends and one of the teams is crowned the winner.
One of my favorite parts of this show are the hosts; James Phelps and Oliver Phelps , who portrayed the beloved Weasley Twins in the Harry Potter films, return to the Wizarding World to host this show. Fred and George were two of my favorite characters in both the books and the films, so I was very excited to hear that they would be the hosts. Together they bring a playful and comedic air to the show, and it truly feels like they were made to be the hosts of this competition. Alongside them, other Harry Potter cast members have joined them as guest judges including Warwick Davis, Bonnie Wright, and Evanna Lynch. Seeing the actors that I have loved since childhood return to the Harry Potter space has been so special, and I love seeing them together again.
The location of the show is another enticing and engaging aspect. It was filmed at the Warner Bros. Studio Tour: The Making of Harry Potter which is where the movies were actually filmed. As someone who has had the wonderful experience of actually visiting the Studio Tour, I absolutely love that this is the place they decided to film the show. It strongly ties in the Harry Potter aspect, allowing the bakers to see the sets and get inspiration from them with first-hand experience. Each episode has a theme; the first one being the team’s favorite part of Harry Potter, the second being Gringotts, and the third being Diagon Alley, so far. I also love that they’ve involved actual Harry Potter fans in the experience as well, allowing them to taste test the baker’s creations in the third episode. I’m only a little bit salty that I wasn’t invited.
As I mentioned above, the bakers are paired together. However, what I like about this is that their partners are chosen for them. This adds a unique challenge to the competition since neither of the teams have ever worked together before. I also like that each team is made up of a cake decorator and a pastry chef, which allows them to both shine in each baking challenge since both skills are necessary to create a show winning piece. I have truly loved getting to know each of the competitors as the show continues, and I’m confident I’ll be heartbroken as more and more leave. Yet, I do have my favorites and I really hope that they win (Go Elizabeth and Juan!)
Unfortunately, nothing in this world can truly be perfect, and there is just one thing about the show I didn’t love.. In the first episode, the teams present their creations one by one by the judges who then immediately choose if they move on or not. I didn’t like this because it meant that the judges made their decisions without tasting or even seeing all of the creations. I felt like this made it unfair to competitors and it doesn’t make much sense to me. For instance, what happens if they reject someone, but then another team does way worse? However, this style of judging was only used in the first episode so I don’t have that much of an issue with it— unless they bring it back. I also wish that the judges were a bit more direct in the critique to help the bakers grow and learn. Most of the time they make unenthusiastic remarks like: “I didn’t like that,” and I’m like okay?? How is that helping?
This show has made Thursdays the highlight of my week, and I cannot wait to see what happens next. If you are a Harry Potter lover or even if you aren’t, this show is so comforting and such a great way to unwind after a long day. I truly feel like this was such an incredible idea and I truly hope we see many more seasons of Wizards of Baking.

author: Nacho Castañón
title: Meta aprovechó el contenido de libros pirateados para entrenar a su IA: los autores aseguran que fue una decisión consciente
text:
Meta, el gigante tecnológico de Mark Zuckerberg, y propietaria de Instagram y Facebook, dos de las redes sociales más populares en España, sigue combatiendo diferentes frentes en cuanto a su inteligencia artificial (IA) se refiere. En estos últimos años se ha conocido que para entrenar a sus modelos de IA la empresa utilizó publicaciones de los usuarios en esas dos plataformas y hasta libros pirateados. Y, sobre estos últimos, ahora un grupo de autores ha asegurado que la compañía era totalmente consciente de ello .
Un grupo de autores, entre los que se encuentran el escritor Ta-Nehisi Coates y la comediante Sarah Silverman, han alegado en unos documentos judiciales revelados recientemente que Meta utilizó versiones pirateadas de libros protegidos por derechos de autor para entrenar sus sistemas de inteligencia artificial. No sólo eso, sino que para ello la empresa contaba con la aprobación del propio consejero delegado, Mark Zuckerberg , según recogen desde Reuters .
Los autores que demandan a Meta por infracción de derechos de autor hicieron estas acusaciones en unos documentos que se hicieron públicos el pasado miércoles en un tribunal federal de California, en Estados Unidos. Además, estos autores han afirmado que los documentos internos presentados por Meta durante el proceso de presentación de pruebas demostraban que el gigante tecnológico sabía que las obras eran piratas .
Ilustración de una inteligencia artificial. iStock Omicrono
Por el momento Meta no se ha pronunciado al respecto sobre este suceso . Una situación que surgió en el año 2023, cuando los autores demandaron a Meta alegando que la empresa hizo un uso indebido de sus libros para entrenar a Llama, su gran modelo de lenguaje. Este caso es uno de varios en los que se manifiesta que obras protegidas por derechos de autor de escritores, artistas y otras personas se usaron para crear productos de IA sin permiso.
En aquel momento los demandados argumentaron que hicieron un uso justo de este material, que está protegido por derechos de autor. Sin embargo, el miércoles pasado los autores solicitaron permiso al tribunal para presentar una demanda actualizada, ya que han asegurado que las nuevas pruebas mostraban que Meta utilizó el conjunto de datos de entrenamiento de IA LibGen, que supuestamente incluye millones de obras pirateadas , y lo distribuyó a través de torrents peer-to-peer .
Reuters Omicrono
[Mark Zuckerberg presiona a EEUU: quiere que la inteligencia artificial de Meta sea la que utilice "todo el Gobierno"] Además de ello, los autores han añadido que las comunicaciones internas de Meta mostraron que el propio Mark Zuckerberg "aprobó el uso de Meta del conjunto de datos LibGen a pesar de las preocupaciones dentro del equipo ejecutivo de IA de Meta (y otros en Meta) de que LibGen es 'un conjunto de datos que sabemos que es pirata'". El año pasado el juez desestimó las alegaciones de que el texto generado por los chatbots de la empresa infringía los derechos de autor y que Meta sustraía ilegalmente la información de gestión de derechos de autor (CMI) de sus libros.
El pasado miércoles los autores argumentaron que las pruebas reforzaban sus reclamaciones por infracción y justificaban la reactivación de su reclamación por CMI y la adición de una nueva reclamación por fraude informático. En la vista de ayer, el juez declaró que permitiría a los autores presentar una demanda modificada, aunque se mostró algo escéptico sobre el fundamento de la misma.

title: VIDEO | An incident in Kumanovo: One of the judges' vehicle was also damaged - Sloboden Pechat
text: VIDEO | An incident in Kumanovo: One of the judges' vehicle was also damaged The last round of Macedonian football is marked by incidents, especially in the second league competition. [After it was previously announced about the incident in Negotino](https://www.slobodenpecat.mk/en/video-incident-vo-negotino-golmanot-na-ohrid-napadnat-od-navivach/) where there was an attack on the goalkeeper of Ohrid, now the Ministry of the Interior has confirmed that the referees faced problems in Kumanovo during the meeting Bashkimi - Belasica. The referees were prevented from entering the dressing room, and one of them had his vehicle damaged. "On September 25.09.2024, XNUMX, it was reported in SVR Kumanovo that after the end of a football match from the second football league between the teams of Bashkimi and Belasica, at the Bashkimi stadium, the referees were prevented from entering their official dressing rooms. After the intervention of the police officers, the referees entered the dressing rooms, and after leaving the stadium they noticed that the Fiat Bravo vehicle with Skopje license plates, owned by one of the referees, was damaged. "Measures are being taken to clear up the case," said the Ministry of the Interior.

author: ABr
title: Arsenal-West Ham: cette incroyable stat qui laisse de gros regrets aux Gunners
text:
Battu à domicile par West Ham (0-2) jeudi pour le compte de la 19eme journée de Premier League, Arsenal a pourtant dominé outrageusement son adversaire à l’Emirates Stadium. La preuve en stats. Triste soirée pour Arsenal. Sous la pluie, les Gunners pensaient conserver leur première place au classement face à West Ham. C’était sans compter sur le réalisme des Hammers et surtout le manque de réalisme des joueurs de Mikel Arteta. Car c’est bien West Ham qui s’est imposé 2-0 à l’Emirates Stadium grâce à des buts de Soucek (13e) et Mavropanos (55e). Les Hammers sont même passés tout près d’une victoire 3-0 mais Benrahma a manqué son penalty dans les ultimes secondes de ce match de la 19eme journée de Premier League.
Trente tirs, 77 touches de balle dans la surface... zéro but En face, les Gunners ont pourtant largement dominé leur adversaire (74% de possession). Mais dominer n’est pas gagner et les stats sont là pour le prouver. Les joueurs d’ Arsenal ont tiré 30 fois au but lors cette rencontre (contre 6 tirs pour West Ham). Seulement huit frappes ont été cadrées. Il y a encore plus impressionnant. Ou plus écœurant pour les Londoniens. Gabriel Jesus et ses partenaires ont touché 77 fois le ballon dans la surface de réparation de West Ham. Selon Opta, aucune équipe n’a été aussi présente dans la "box" adverse depuis la saison 2008-2009 lors d’un match de Premier League. Soixante-dix-sept touches de balle et pas un but… Mikel Arteta attendra davantage d’efficacité de ses joueurs lors du prochain rendez-vous dimanche sur la pelouse de Fulham (15h). En attendant, Arsenal a cédé son fauteuil de leader à Livepool.

author: Leonardo Meireles
title: RJ, SP, MG e ES têm previsão de chuva extrema e risco de deslizamentos
text: RJ, SP, MG e ES têm previsão de chuva extrema e risco de deslizamentos Segundo a meteorologia, a chuva extrema fará com quem a média histórica de precipitações no período seja ultrapassada atualizado Compartilhar notícia O fim de semana será de [chuva extrema na Região Sudeste](https://www.metropoles.com/brasil/veja-cidades-sob-alerta-de-grande-perigo-para-chuvas-no-sudeste), causada por uma frente fria, com perspectiva de que a média histórica de precipitações seja ultrapassada. Segundo o Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia ( [Inmet](https://portal.inmet.gov.br/)), os alertas são principalmente para este sábado (23/3), mas podem se estender até domingo (24/3). “No decorrer dos próximos dias, essa frente fria vai avançar pela Região Sudeste e, até a passagem da frente, ainda vamos ter fluxo de umidade, vento levando umidade do oceano em direção ao Rio de Janeiro”, afirmou Márcia Seabra, coordenadora do Inmet. Segundo a especialista, todos os estados devem entrar em alerta: “A gente tem estes acumulados muito grandes de chuva, que pegam desde o litoral norte de São Paulo, pegam todo o estado do Rio de Janeiro, Zona da Mata de Minas Gerais e o sul do Espírito Santo”. O site [Climatempo](https://www.climatempo.com.br/) avisa a chegada de nova e grande frente fria no decorrer desta sexta-feira (22/3), em alto-mar, na altura do litoral. [No Rio de Janeiro, os volumes de chuva podem ultrapassar a média histórica](https://www.metropoles.com/brasil/chuvas-paes-pede-que-cariocas-fiquem-em-casa-e-dispensem-funcionarios). “Entre a sexta-feira (22/3) e o sábado (23/3), a frente fria se desloca lentamente sobre o estado e provoca chuva frequente/persistente, por vezes forte, com taxas horárias muito elevadas. Isso irá acarretar acumulados extremamente elevados, que podem superar o volume médio para todo o mês de março em apenas 24h/48 horas”, aponta o site. Chuva extrema e ventania Em São Paulo, o tempo começou a mudar já na tarde de quinta-feira (21/3). Apesar de as temperaturas continuarem altas, a tal frente fria chega trazendo muita chuva, com risco de temporais para toda a Grande São Paulo, o litoral e as cidades do interior. O que realmente preocupa são as ventanias. É possível o aparecimento de rajadas com cerca de 100 km/h. Ou seja, há possibilidade de queda de árvore e galhos, além de problemas na distribuição de energia. Enquanto na capital, a previsão de chuva é de 40 mm, o litoral deve receber média de 50mm. Já em Minas Gerais, 96 cidades se encontram em situação de emergência por causa de desastres relacionados às chuvas. Por outro lado, 177 municípios receberam alerta de seca ou estiagem, segundo a Defesa Civil Estadual. Tempestades de granizo, vendavais e enxurradas vão atingir diversas regiões, como Vale do Jequitinhonha, Norte, Sul e Zona da Mata. E no Espírito Santo, chuvas torrenciais são esperadas. Há previsão de chuvas de até 100 milímetros em 24 horas nas regiões sul e serrana, além de alagamentos e deslizamentos de terra. Segundo o Inmet, porém, algumas regiões podem ter volume chegando a 200 milímetros até domingo (24/3).

author: 寫新聞
title: 前政院院長毛治國勉勵高餐大畢業生 思路決定出路態度決定高度
text:
【寫新聞-記者洪惠美/高雄報導】
高雄餐旅大學今年畢業典禮特別感人，擔任讚禮官的是陽明交大終身榮譽教授毛治國，在民國80年教育部推動籌設高餐建校，毛治國院長時任交通部觀光局局長，為規劃小組委員，為校擘劃藍圖，立下宏遠目標，毛教授亦為校長陳敦基恩師，兩人也曾在交通部觀光局共事，師生同台，象徵薪火相傳，生生不息，一同見證教育為百年樹人基業，世代交替開創新局。毛教授期許高餐大畢業生「思路決定出路，態度決定高度；挑戰孕育創新，問題代表機會」，勇於創新，不斷學習新知，日後拓展無限可能性。
產業界貴賓代表邀請到香港理工大學酒店觀光管理博士，身兼中華亞太餐旅觀光教育理事會(Asia-Pacific CHRIE)台灣分會理事長及慕舍酒店董事長，王劭仁，看似一帆風順的背後，其實有很多的辛酸，不吝和畢業生分享國中留級，一開始工作就被霸凌，創業第八年差點所有公司都倒掉，才剛開飯店，就在2020年，遇到疫情…，種種的不順都挺下來了，鼓勵同學要不計較，天道酬勤，永遠都不忘學習，字字句句發自肺腑，在場畢業生及家長十分動容，熱烈鼓掌。
容繼業校長應邀回校為畢業生獻上祝福，為現場增添溫馨氣氛，而應屆畢業生正好是陳敦基校長就任之初入學，正逢COVID-19疫情蔓延全球，新生入學時，校園迎新、授課型態與校園生活皆受到衝擊，如今能以隆重典禮為大學生活畫下美好句點，校長感性以「敬」、「競」、「靜」來和畢業生分享，敬業:追求卓越，敬天:尊重大自然，敬人:勇於承擔；競爭，和自己競爭也和別人競爭，與時俱進，不斷提升自己；靜，寧靜致遠，淡定從容；最後以「塵起塵落緣自在 人來人去情永在」，祝福畢業生鵬程萬里!
回顧四年就學期間，高餐大皆名列QS世界大學學科排名前50大，2022、2023年更高居全球第38名，國際聲譽卓著；並獲教育部逾七千萬元補助，進行全校多項公共空間翻新，包括廁所、電梯、田徑場與籃排球場等，打造嶄新學生活動環境。同時，完成第二實習大樓「智慧餐旅與數位轉型基地」，建構「敦品廳-共創基地」、「勵學堂-共學空間」，以及圖書館一樓的「欣傳館」數位校務展示，並重新設計宿舍交誼廳，全面提升校園學習與生活品質。在《遠見》「服務領域」大學評比排名亦居首，充分展現高餐人才的專業力與實戰力，讓畢業生步出校門更有底氣，張開雙臂擁抱世界，開創人生新篇章。
